name: Duplicate role for the same contact
description: Alert when an account lists the same contact multiple times with the same role.

name: Missing role on account contact
description: Alert when a contact linked to an account is missing a role.

name: Conflicting roles for same contact name
description: Alert when the same contact name appears with multiple roles for an account.

name: Duplicate phone numbers
description: Alert when a contact has repeated phone numbers.

name: Duplicate email addresses
description: Alert when a contact has repeated email addresses.
